name: Unconventional Shackles
description:
You've been taken prisoner by forces unknown! Use your wits- and this giant spiked ball and chain- to navigate the challenges before you, defend yourself, and eventually, escape!

Recommended to play in 1024*768.
Controls:
W/A/S/D: Movement
Z: Wait (Allows the ball to roll)
Spacebar:  Pull the chain (Make the ball roll towards you / the chain)
R: Reset the level
Escape: Go back to the first level

Credits to: https://natancosta.itch.io/modicus-dungeon for the tileset.
